names.pinyin: xin zhi ju pi zhu ru tang
names.commonEnglish: Newly-Formulated Tangerine Peel and Bamboo Shavings Decoction

actions: Regulates Qi, adjusts the Middle, relieves the diaphragm and descends Qi.
With Jiang Zhi, mitigates its Cold properties and enhances its ability to stop vomiting.
Breaks up Phlegm and reduces coughing. (Add to the decoction.)
